title: The Adventures of Rex and Rinty

sources.description:
MASCOT 12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Rex-King of the Wild Horses, Rin Tin Tin Jr.
Co-starring: Kane Richmond, Smiley Burnette, Norma Taylor
Directors: Ford Beebe, B. Reeves Eason
‚ÄúThe Adventures of Rex and Rinty‚Äù features the world‚Äôs most famous animal stars‚ÄîRex, King of the Wild Horses, and Rin Tin Tin Jr., son of the legendary Rin Tin Tin. Together, they face danger, treachery, and ancient secrets in a suspenseful jungle expedition full of stunts, action, and heart. Starring Kane Richmond, Norma Taylor, and Mischa Auer, this serial is a must-watch for fans of vintage film and animal heroes.

Experience the thrilling 12-chapter cliffhanger from the golden age of serials! This action-packed adventure was produced by Nat Levine‚Äôs Mascot Pictures, known for pioneering sound serials in the 1930s. Directed by Ford Beebe and B. Reeves Eason, this 1935 classic showcases the unmatched energy of early Hollywood storytelling.

#TheAdventuresOfRexAndRinty #RinTinTinJr #ClassicSerials #1930sMovies #VintageCinema #RexTheWonderHorse #MascotPictures #OldHollywood #CliffhangerSerial #AdventureFilm

metadata.Plot: A 12 episode serial starring Rex, the King of the Wild Horses and Rin-Tin-Tin, Jr. Rex is brought from the island of Sujan, where he is worshiped as a God-Horse, to the U.S. to be trained as a polo pony. He escapes, meets Rinty and with the help of Frank Bradley is returned to Sujan. The natives have been persuaded to turn against their God-Horse, however he is rescued just in time before he is burned as a sacrifice.
metadata.Writer: John Rathmell, Barney A. Sarecky, B. Reeves Eason
metadata.Actors: Rex, Rin Tin Tin Jr., Kane Richmond
